body.p:
This release (Codename: Sinterklaas) has...
Add more items
A new element called dataFacet for restricting references to W3C datatypes in ODD.
supplied is now part of model.choicePart, so it can be used within choice.
A new attribute require has been added to att.textCritical. It can be used to indicate interdependance between variant readings.

In addition, improvements have been made to the XSL stylesheets (which provide processing of TEI ODD files for Roma and OxGarage as well as other TEI conversions). The Stylesheets are maintained separately from the Guidelines and are at https://github.com/TEIC/Stylesheets.
